**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- In its normal form, a _spy staff_ is a slim rod of burnished wood with subtle etchings of eyes upon its sides. The first to develop the _spy staff_ were agents of Andoran's Twilight Talons, but such staves have spread to espionage agencies throughout the Inner Sea region and beyond. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Effect** You change the shape and appearance of this staff to that of an ordinary handheld accessory of your choosing of the same Bulk. The staff’s statistics don’t change. Only a creature benefiting from [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) or a similar effect can attempt to disbelieve this illusion, with a DC of 27. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Spy Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 2.0 **Price** 340 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1598)
  • **1st** [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1568), [_invisible item_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2004), [_message rune_](/Spells.aspx?ID=581)
  • **2nd** [_disguise magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1491), [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1560), _illusory disguise_
Spy Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 2.0 **Price** 1,175 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The DC to disbelieve the illusion disguising the staff is 32.
  • **3rd** [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1465), _illusory disguise_, [_veil of privacy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739)
  • **4th** _clairvoyance_, [_peaceful bubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1624)
Spy Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 2.0 **Price** 5,300 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The DC to disbelieve the illusion disguising the staff is 38.
  • **5th** [_mind probe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1601), [_scouting eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1661)
  • **6th** [_mislead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1605), [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1662)
name: Spy Staff
